description: This file declares the AppNotifications class, which is part of a plugin system for JSONRPC communication within the WPEFramework. It inherits from PluginHost::IPlugin and PluginHost::JSONRPC, indicating its role in handling plugin notifications and RPC messaging. The class includes constructor, destructor, and override methods for initialization, deinitialization, and information retrieval, along with interface mapping and private members related to service management and notification handling.

classes.name: AppNotifications
classes.description: Represents a plugin class responsible for managing app notifications and JSONRPC communication in the WPEFramework environment.

methods.name: AppNotifications
methods.description: Constructor for the AppNotifications class, initializing internal members.

methods.name: ~AppNotifications
methods.description: Destructor for the AppNotifications class, performing cleanup.

methods.name: Initialize
methods.description: Initializes the plugin with the provided shell interface; returns a string status.

methods.name: Deinitialize
methods.description: Deinitializes the plugin associated with the provided shell service.

methods.name: string Information() const
methods.description: Returns a string containing plugin information; currently an empty JSON object.

ctags.name: AppNotifications
ctags.pattern: /^        class AppNotifications : public PluginHost::IPlugin, public PluginHost::JSONRPC {$/

ctags.name: Information
ctags.pattern: /^            virtual string Information() const override { return {}; }$/
